result.title: Matrix and queries
result.content: Given an n x m matrix filled with non negative values. Each value in a cell represents a weighted edge to reach each of its adjacent cells. We need to calculate the shortest path from 1,1 to n,m after each of the q queries. They are of two types Type 1 : block cell x,y Type 2 : unblock cell x,y How can we achieve this? n,m <= 1000 q <= 1000
